column5: Hope you have a great day Chuck!!!  And many many more...  Maureen
Thanks all,Really sad thing is that I usually celebrate at Lakair,but not in the cards this year.......Everyone else have a great time....and thanks again....TC and tight lines......Chuck...
Ha, you don't look a day older than you did yesterday...best of health.
happy Bday Chuck.. were gonna miss ya!
Happy Birthday Big Guy!!!  We'll really miss you at Lakair this year, just won't be the same without you.  Joey & Paul
Happy Birthday Chuck...  I guess Simcoe will have to do this time eh?
Looking way up and if ya can hear me from down here,hope ya had a great day bud.
Happy birthday bud I am sorry I missed it this year.    Art
Oh Yeah!!!... Best Fishes to Chuck!!!   .. don't think you're too big for a Birthday spankin' Mister!!!
Thanks again all,Looks like everyone had a good time,We're already planning to NOT miss next year....TC and tight lines....Chuck....
A belated happy birthday big guy. All the very best to you!
Hope you had a great day Chuck, and many more to you.
Happy Birthday Chuck..  We missed you at Lakair.. See you at BOQ  or on the ice with me hitting a ride
